title: ADVISORY-India markets closed on Monday for holiday
text:
ADVISORY-India markets closed on Monday for holiday

Forex 1 hour ago (Oct 28, 2019 07:06)

ADVISORY-India markets closed on Monday for holiday Oct 28 (Reuters) - India's currency, debt and equity markets will be closed on Monday for a public holiday. Financial markets will resume trading on Tuesday, Oct. 29. The broader NSE index ended 0.01% higher at 11,582.60 on Friday, while the benchmark BSE closed up 0.1% at 39,058.06. For the week, both NSE and BSE closed over half a percent lower. (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
